Keyboard shortcuts for Superhuman

A visual cheat-sheet for the 149 keyboard shortcuts found in Superhuman. This application is MacOS-only.

Original Reference Report Issue

Actions

Superhuman command

  • Cmd
  • K

Search

  • /

Undo

  • Z

Shortcuts

  • ?

Select conversation

  • X

Add to selection

  • Shift
  • J/K

Filters

Unread

  • Shift
  • U

Starred

  • Shift
  • S

Important

  • Shift
  • I

No reply

  • Shift
  • R

Messages

Compose

  • C

Reply all

  • Enter

Reply

  • R

Forward

  • F

Open links and attachments

  • Cmd
  • O

  • Tab

Expand message

  • O

Expand all messages

  • Shift
  • O
